Author: Sumesh P
Summary: This Azure Runbook Workflow helps to Start/Stop VMs in Azure ARM portal in a defined sequence using TagsTo onboard servers, simply add a Tag named 'AutoStart' with a Json formatted value in the form {"Group":"1","Sequence":"2"}You can target individual GROUPS or ALL
Title: Azure Runbook - Start-Stop Azure ARM VMs in a defined sequence using Tags
UserTags: Azure Runbooks, Azure VMs Scheduled Start and Shutdown
